REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0458 reute b f BC-BANK-OF-NOVA-SCOTIA-I 03-11 0097

TEXT.TITLE: BANK OF NOVA SCOTIA ISSUES NEW ZEALAND DLR BOND
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of Nova Scotia, Nassau branch, is issuing a 50 mln New Zealand dlr eurobond due April 14, 1989 carrying a 18-1/4 pct coupon and priced at 101 pct, lead manager Morgan Stanley International said. The issue, which will take the form of deposit notes, will be co-lead by Dominion Securities and Wood Gundy Inc. The bond is available in denominations of 1,000 and 10,000 dlrs and payment date is April 14. Fees comprise 3/4 pct selling concession and 1/2 pct for management and underwriting. REUTER
